headline: Market will be more volatile than 'patient' on AI CapEx
summary: US stocks (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC) are ticking up on Monday to start the shortened trading week. What is Wall Street's market outlook for 2026 as more experts consider the risk tied to certain variables, such as the debt profiles attached to the AI trade? The Wealth Alliance President and Managing Director Eric Diton shares his thoughts. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

content.title: Market will be more volatile than 'patient' on AI CapEx
content.description:
US stocks (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC) are ticking up on Monday to start the shortened trading week. What is Wall Street's market outlook for 2026 as more experts consider the risk tied to certain variables, such as the debt profiles attached to the AI trade?

The Wealth Alliance President and Managing Director Eric Diton shares his thoughts.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Freddie Mac Issues Monthly Volume Summary for November 2025
summary: MCLEAN, Va., Dec. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Freddie Mac (OTCQB: FMCC) today posted to its website its Monthly Volume Summary for November 2025, which provides information on Freddie Mac’s mortgage-related portfolios, securities issuance, risk management, delinquencies, debt activities and other investments. Freddie Mac’s mission is to make home possible for families across the nation. We promote liquidity, stability and affordability in the housing market throughout all economic cycles. Since

headline: Novo Nordisk A/S: Wegovy® pill approved in the US as first oral GLP-1 for weight management
